attributes.additional_details: Increase the NHS pay by 15% and give all NHS workers A bonus for all their work during the covid pandemic
attributes.background: Increase the NHS pay by 15% and give all NHS workers A bonus for all their work during the covid pandemic

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give all NHS staff a minimum 15% backdated pay rise - including junior doctors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593087

Pay a £2,500 bonus to all NHS employees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578041

Pay NHS staff a one-off bonus that recognises their efforts to combat covid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578308
